activities: Pointivity specializes in private cloud solutions and the hosting of business applications such as accounting, ERP, CRM, Microsoft Office and Exchange for small and medium sized businesses. Pointivity will provide privacy protection to Personal Information transmitted to Pointivity by its Clients from the EU/EEA in accordance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles as described herein. Pointivity Clients may transmit personal employee contact information such as name, title, address, phone, facsimile and email address to Pointivity for service provisioning and support. In providing Services or support related to the Services, Pointivity may process Personal Information owned and/or controlled by Clients. Pointivity acts as a processor on its Clients’ behalf by obtaining, holding, and erasing client data. Pointivity will process this Personal Information on behalf of its Clients consistent with the Client’s instructions and the applicable Safe Harbor Principles.
personaldata: organization, client, on-line and off-line data
